alert.note: Alert for Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 9:44PM MDT until June 11 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE...SOUTHERN LAWRENCE...WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON...NORTHEASTERN WESTON AND SOUTHEASTERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 943 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Buckhorn, or 18 miles southeast of Sundance, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Buckhorn around 950 PM MDT. Mallo Camp and O`Neil Pass around 955 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Crooks Tower, Black Fox Campground, Flag Mountain, Deerfield, Deerfield Reservoir, Rochford, Roubaix Lake, Mystic, Silver City and Pactola Reservoir. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 45 and 51. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
